name: Fortune Builder
description:
Back of Box - ColecoVision (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

THE HIGH-RISK REAL ESTATE STRATEGY GAME

Enter the boom-or-bust world of real estate speculation. Will you create an empire ..or wind up flat broke? The outcome is determined by your decision-making and investment strategies!

Use your wits—and your FORTUNE BUILDER™ bankroll—to develop the right properties at the right time. Build hotels, marinas, and amusement parks. Or put up a casino, ski resort, factory or shopping mall. The smarter your investments, the more traffic you attract—and the more income you stash away!

Need cash to build more? Sell a property or borrow money. But keep a sharp eye on those interest rates! Watch for fast-breaking headlines and bulletins as they flash across the screen. How you react can make or break you!

Play alone and try to top your best "bottom line." Or compete head-to-head with another entrepreneur. Either way, FORTUNE BUILDER™ is a sure-shot investment in fun.

LEARNING OPPORTUNITIES
  • Strategy Development
  • Multi-variable Decision-Making
  • Complex Problem Solving
